oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mat sieves said to be generally made by the Bushmen, but skin sieves by the Grass Bushmen and the Koranna-Hottentots. In English, after Dia!kwain (L V.-25. VI note). Sieves supposed also to be used by the early race. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-27. 8391 and 8392). !yuiten !haken
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mat sieves
